files.Title: DrawnUi.Animate.Animators.VelocitySkiaAnimator
files.Summary: Basically a modified port of Android FlingAnimation

files.Title: DrawnUi.Controls.AnimatedFramesRenderer
files.Summary: Base class for playing frames. Subclass to play spritesheets, gifs, custom animations etc.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Controls.GridLayout
files.Summary: Helper class for SkiaLayout Type = LayoutType.Grid

files.Title: DrawnUi.Controls.RadioButtons
files.Summary: Manages radio button groups, ensuring only one button is selected per group. Supports grouping by parent control or by string name.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Controls.SkiaCarousel
files.Summary: A specialized scroll control designed for creating swipeable carousels with automatic snapping to items. Supports data binding through ItemsSource and ItemTemplate, peek effects with SidesOffset, and smooth transitions. Ideal for image galleries, tab interfaces, and any swipeable content display.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Controls.SkiaDrawnCell
files.Summary: Base ISkiaCell implementation

files.Title: DrawnUi.Controls.SkiaDynamicDrawnCell
files.Summary: This cell can watch binding context property changing

files.Title: DrawnUi.Controls.SkiaMauiEntry
files.Summary: Used to draw maui element over a skia canvas. Positions elelement using drawnUi layout and sometimes just renders element bitmap snapshot instead of displaying the real element, for example, when scrolling/animating.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Controls.SkiaRadioButton
files.Summary: Switch-like control, can include any content inside. It's aither you use default content (todo templates?..) or can include any content inside, and properties will by applied by convention to a SkiaShape with Tag Frame, SkiaShape with Tag Thumb. At the same time you can override ApplyProperties() and apply them to your content yourself.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Controls.SkiaShell
files.Summary: A Canvas with Navigation capabilities

files.Title: DrawnUi.Controls.SkiaSpinner
files.Summary: A wheel-of-names spinner control that displays items in a circular arrangement and allows spinning to select an item through gesture interaction.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Controls.SkiaSprite
files.Summary: Renders animated sprite sheets by subclassing AnimatedFramesRenderer

files.Title: DrawnUi.Controls.SkiaViewSwitcher
files.Summary: Display and hide views, eventually animating them

files.Title: DrawnUi.Controls.SkiaWheelScroll
files.Summary: A specialized scroll view that displays items in a 3D wheel-like arrangement

files.Title: DrawnUi.Controls.SkiaWheelShape
files.Summary: Custom SkiaShape that positions children in a circular arrangement around the wheel circumference. Handles rotation and positioning calculations for the spinner wheel.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.ActionOnTickAnimator
files.Summary: Just register this animator to run custom code on every frame creating a kind of game loop if needed.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.AddGestures
files.Summary: For fast and lazy gestures handling to attach to dran controls inside the canvas only

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.BindToParentContextExtension
files.Summary: Compiled-bindings-friendly implementation for "Source.Parent.BindingContext.Path"

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.DebugImage
files.Summary: Control for displaying used Surface as a preview image, for debugging purposes. Do not use this in prod, this will be invalidated every frame, causing non-stop screen update.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.DrawnFontAttributesConverter
files.Summary: Forked from Microsoft.Maui.Controls as using original class was breaking XAML HotReload for some unknown reason

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.FluentExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for fluent API design pattern with DrawnUI controls

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.FrameTimeInterpolator
files.Summary: Interpolated time between frames, works in seconds. See examples..

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.GesturesMode
files.Summary: Used by the canvas, do not need this for drawn controls

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.IAnimatorsManager
files.Summary: This control is responsible for updating screen for running animators

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.IThemeProvider
files.Summary: Platform-agnostic theme provider interface for cross-platform compatibility

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.MauiKey
files.Summary: These are platform-independent. They correspond to JavaScript keys.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.MauiThemeProvider
files.Summary: MAUI-specific theme provider implementation

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.ObservableAttachedItemsCollection<T>
files.Summary: We have to subclass ObservableCollection to avoid it sending empty oldItems upon Reset.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.PlanesScroll.ViewLayoutInfo
files.Summary: Holds layout information for a rendered month cell.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.PlanesScroll
files.Summary: Provides the ability to create/draw views directly while scrolling. Content will be generated dynamically, instead of the usual way. This control main logic is inside PaintOnPlane override, also it hacks content to work without a real Content. You have to override GetMeasuredView to provide your views to be drawn upon passed index. TODO: for horizonal

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.ProgressTrail
files.Summary: Progress trail component for linear progress bars. Similar to SliderTrail but optimized for progress display.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.RenderingAnimator
files.Summary: This animator renders on canvas instead of just updating a value

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.ShaderDoubleTexturesEffect
files.Summary: Base shader effect class that has 2 input textures.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.Sk3dView
files.Summary: Custom implementation of Android's Camera 3D helper for SkiaSharp

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaBackdrop
files.Summary: Warning with CPU-rendering edges will not be blurred: https://issues.skia.org/issues/40036320

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaBevel
files.Summary: Defines properties for creating bevel or emboss effects on shapes.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaButton.ButtonStyleType
files.Summary: Defines the button style variants available for different visual appearances.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaButton.IconPositionType
files.Summary: Defines the position of an icon relative to the button text

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaButton
files.Summary: Button-like control, can include any content inside. It's either you use default content (todo templates?..) or can include any content inside, and properties will by applied by convention to a SkiaLabel with Tag MainLabel, SkiaShape with Tag MainFrame. At the same time you can override ApplyProperties() and apply them to your content yourself. Convention elements tags: BtnText, BtnShape.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaCheckbox
files.Summary: Switch-like control, can include any content inside. It's aither you use default content (todo templates?..) or can include any content inside, and properties will by applied by convention to a SkiaShape with Tag Frame, SkiaShape with Tag Thumb. At the same time you can override ApplyProperties() and apply them to your content yourself.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaControlWithRect
files.Summary: Used inside RenderingTree. Rect is real drawing position

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaFrame
files.Summary: Alias for SkiaShape type Rectangle

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaGrid
files.Summary: MAUI Grid alternative

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaHoverMask
files.Summary: Paints the parent view with the background color with a clipped viewport oth this view size

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaLabel.ObjectPools
files.Summary: Thread-safe object pools for reducing GC allocations in text measurement

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaLabel.PooledStringBuilder
files.Summary: Helper struct for managing pooled StringBuilder with automatic return

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaLabel.SpanMeasurement
files.Summary: Span-based measurement methods to avoid string allocations

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaLabel
files.Summary: A high-performance text rendering control that provides advanced text formatting, layout, and styling capabilities using SkiaSharp for rendering.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaLayer
files.Summary: Absolute layout like MAUI Grid with just one column and row

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaLayout.BackgroundMeasurementContext
files.Summary: Context for background measurement operations

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaLayout.BackgroundMeasurementStartingPosition
files.Summary: Stores the starting position data when background measurement begins Used to detect and compensate for position changes due to visibility changes

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaLayout.BuildWrapLayout
files.Summary: Implementation for LayoutType.Wrap

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaLayout.MeasuredItemInfo
files.Summary: Information about a measured item for sliding window management

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaLayout.SecondPassArrange
files.Summary: Cell.Area contains the area for layout

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaLayout.StructureChangeType
files.Summary: Types of structure changes that can be applied

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaMarkdownLabel
files.Summary: Left for compatibility, use SkiaRichLabel

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaProgress
files.Summary: Linear progress bar control with platform-specific styling. Shows progress from Min to Value within the Min-Max range.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaRangeBase
files.Summary: Base class for range-based controls like sliders and progress bars. Provides common functionality for value ranges, track management, and platform styling.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaRichLabel
files.Summary: Will internally create spans from markdown. Spans property must not be set directly.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaRow
files.Summary: Horizontal stack, like MAUI HorizontalStackLayout

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaScrollLooped
files.Summary: Cycles content, so the scroll never ands but cycles from the start

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaShaderEffect
files.Summary: IPostRendererEffect

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaShape
files.Summary: Extension of SkiaShape that adds bevel and emboss functionality

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaStack
files.Summary: Vertical stack, like MAUI VerticalStackLayout

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaSwitch
files.Summary: Switch-like control, can include any content inside. It's aither you use default content (todo templates?..) or can include any content inside, and properties will by applied by convention to a SkiaShape with Tag Frame, SkiaShape with Tag Thumb. At the same time you can override ApplyProperties() and apply them to your content yourself.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaToggle
files.Summary: Base control for toggling between 2 states. It provides no gestures support by itsself.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.SkiaWrap
files.Summary: A powerful flexible control, a bit like WPF StackPanel, arranges children in a responsive way according available size. Can change the number of Columns to use by default.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.ThemeBinding
files.Summary: Represents a theme binding for a specific target object and property Implements proper disposal pattern and weak references to prevent memory leaks

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.ThemeBindingExtension
files.Summary: Theme binding extension for DrawnUI controls Supports MAUI, Blazor, and other platforms through IThemeProvider abstraction

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.ThemeBindingManager
files.Summary: Simplified theme binding manager using DrawnUI's disposal mechanism No periodic cleanup needed - controls clean up themselves!

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.ThemeBindings
files.Summary: Helper methods for using theme bindings in code-behind

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.ThemeChangedEventArgs
files.Summary: Theme changed event arguments

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.ViewsAdapter
files.Summary: Top level class for working with ItemTemplates. Holds visible views.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.ViewsIterator
files.Summary: To iterate over virtual views

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.VirtualScroll
files.Summary: this control gets a view and draws it on a virtual scrolling plane

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.ViscousFluidInterpolator
files.Summary: Ported from google android

files.Title: DrawnUi.Draw.ZoomContent
files.Summary:
Wrapper to zoom and pan content by changing the rendering scale so not affecting quality, this is not a transform.

DEBUG INSTRUCTIONS:

  • Key debug outputs are enabled for pan movements and clamp operations
  • Call DumpDebugState() manually to get a full state dump
  • Uncomment debug sections in DrawViews, MeasureContent, ComputeContentScale for frame-by-frame debugging
  • Watch for [ClampOffsetImage] CLAMPED! messages to see when pan limits are hit
  • The DebugSummary provides comprehensive state when hitting pan limits

files.Title: DrawnUi.Infrastructure.PaperFormat
files.Summary: Standard paper formats

files.Title: DrawnUi.Infrastructure.VisualTransform
files.Summary: Will enhance this in the future to include more properties

files.Title: DrawnUi.Views.BasePageReloadable
files.Summary: Base class for a page with canvas, supports C# HotReload for building UI with code (not XAML). Override Build(), see examples.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Views.Canvas
files.Summary: Optimized DrawnView having only one child inside Content property. Can autosize to to children size. For all drawn app put this directly inside the ContentPage as root view. If you put this inside some Maui control like Grid whatever expect more GC collections during animations making them somewhat less fluid.

files.Title: DrawnUi.Views.DisposableManager
files.Summary: Manages delayed disposal of IDisposable objects based on frame count

files.Title: DrawnUi.Views.DrawnUiBasePage
files.Summary: Actually used to: respond to keyboard resizing on mobile and keyboard key presses on Mac. Other than for that this is not needed at all.
